municipality_name.title: Municipality
municipality_name.description: Municipality name per Federal Statistical Office (FSO)

max_bandwidth_mbit_sec.title: Max. available bandwidth [Mbit/s]
max_bandwidth_mbit_sec.description: Maximum available fixed network bandwidth at this location (in Mbit/s).

median_bandwidth_mbit_sec.title: Median bandwidth [Mbit/s]
median_bandwidth_mbit_sec.description:
Median fixed network bandwidth (in Mbit/s), grouped into the following ranges:
3-10 Mbit/s
10-20 Mbit/s
20-40 Mbit/s
40-80 Mbit/s
80-120 Mbit/s
120-500 Mbit/s
500-1000 Mbit/s

best_technology.title: Best available technology
best_technology.description:
Best available technology at this location. Possible values:
- FTTH (includes Fibre to the Home (FTTH) and Fibre to the Office (FTTO), indicated by ‘FTTH’)
- FTTS/B (Fibre to the Street/Building)
- FTTC (includes FTTC+ and Fibre to the Curb (FTTC), indicated by ‘FTTC’)
- VDSL/ADSL (Very High Speed/Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line)
Further information about these technologies can be found here:
https://www.swisscom.ch/en/about/company/portrait/network/technologies.html
